parameters.query:
SELECT l.id, l.source, l.name, l.username, l.email, l.profile_url, l.follower_count, l.bio, l.verified, l.location
FROM leads l
LEFT JOIN enriched_leads el ON l.id = el.lead_id
WHERE el.lead_id IS NULL
LIMIT 10;

parameters.columns: lead_id, niche, score, notes, message, compliant, compliance_notes, ai_confidence, enrichment_version
